| Overview                = The '''Dynameis''',  '''Virtues''',{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}} or '''Choir of Virtues''',{{r|Gambit Vol 2 2}} are (in [[Christianity]]'s hierarchy of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]) a choir of the [[Second Sphere]], along with the [[Kyriotites]] ([[Dominions]]) and [[Exousiai]] ([[Powers (Angels)|Powers]]).{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}

[[Haniel (Earth-616)|Hanael]], the disputed [[Archangels (Earth-616)|Archangel]], was the prince of this choir.{{r|Gambit Vol 2 2}}{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}
